quotes.quote: Pure mathematics is, in its way, the poetry of logical ideas.

quotes.from: Shakuntala Devi, Indian writer and mental calculator
quotes.quote: Without mathematics, there’s nothing you can do. Everything around you is mathematics. Everything around you is numbers.
We will always have STEM with us. Some things will drop out of the public eye and go away, but there will always be science, engineering, and technology. And there will always, always be mathematics.
Mathematics is not about numbers, equations, computations, or algorithms: it is about understanding.
A mathematician who is not also something of a poet will never be a complete mathematician.
Just because we can’t find a solution, it doesn’t mean there isn’t one.

quotes.from: Bernard Baruch, American financier and philanthropist
quotes.quote: Millions saw the apple fall, but Newton asked why.
If people do not believe that mathematics is simple, it is only because they do not realize how complicated life is.
Obvious’ is the most dangerous word in mathematics.
Wherever there is number, there is beauty.
